about_the_game:
When life starts getting messy, it’s CLEANING time.
Ana ended up in a seemingly endless loop of misfortune. First, she lost her job and couldn’t find a new one, then her boyfriend left her... Everything around Ana just seemed to crumble. No hope, no nothing - and there wasn't a hint of a clear path ahead in her life...

Well, as wise people would say, sometimes the secret of happiness is to have low expectations.

With a bit of luck, fate finally granted Ana some relief, and brought her a chance to start anew.. in the form of a cleaning service advertisement, right in front of her eyes.
Not really having any alternatives, she decided to go for it. Beth, the owner of the cleaning service, happened to be in a desperate need of help as well!
INSTANT MATCH. BINGO. Now these two girls can help each other and make their lives crystal clean again!

Together as CLEANING QUEENS, they can clean up anything! Pick up a broom with them and let the cleaning begin! 🧹

Gameplay


- PICK AND MOVE for a start! Get rid of garbage and move objects from the floor. Make it clean~
- DRAG AND DROP misplaced things! They need to be found and placed where they belong. Let’s keep them neat!
- FIX broken things!
- SPRAY stains until the house shines like crystal!
- SCRUB with a powerful BRUSH and give a fresh, clean look to nasty-looking surfaces!
- VACUUM from floor to ceiling, and deal with spider webs with... THE WEBSTER!
- RENOVATE Beth's house and bring it to its former glory!
- PARTICIPATE in events to earn prizes in-game!
- COMPLETE achievements to earn even MORE prizes (in-game)! :)

Features


- Graphics that get prettier when you clean!
- Easy to play! All you need is a mouse, a trackpad, a nub... whatever can move the cursor and click!
- Decorate and clean both the inside but outside the house too! Double the cleaning, double the variety, double the fun!
- In-game events!
- More than 50 eye-candy levels of cleaning and renovating!
- Redesigned shop - even more items for everyone's taste!

CLEAN YOUR HOME, UN-MESS YOUR LIFE! HELP THE GIRLS!
PLAY CLEANING QUEENS: Crystal Clean Home NOW! 💧 🧹 🧽

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz (INTEL ONLY)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (INTEL ONLY)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cleaning Queens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: House cleaning has never been more fun - grab your mouse, sit back, relax, and clean up numerous rooms in this satisfying point-and-click game!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
